actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Drug Abuse Office and Treatment Act of 1972 to permit the voluntary disclosure of certain patient records to employers.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Permits, under the Drug Abuse Office and Treatment Act of 1972, the voluntary disclosure of patient records to employers, if the patient and the person responsible for the disclosure of the record jointly determine that the disclosure will assist in the patient's rehabilitation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Drug Abuse Office and Treatment Act of 1972 to permit the voluntary disclosure of certain patient records to employers.
